This game has ruined my life, but god I cannot stop playing it. Firstly we're gonna talk about the skins. BHVR knows what they're doing, and you cannot convince me that they dont. YOU CANNOT TELL ME. that they just *happen* to think/conceptualize that beach mikaela skin?? you're just gonna say that to my face? They added some of the hottest female characters in the game. Personally I havent spent money on this game, (or at least not over 20 dollars), but there are so many cosmetics I would drop a Phat Stack for. Behavior really has a habit of making good skins unfortunately

Second of all, this game is a monster(lovers) PARADISE. Myself included. You're tellin' me they weren't considering the fan art when they added both pyramid-head and ghostface to this degeneracy game? borderline porn. just look at those mori's. Are you just gonna sit here and tell me that they want a non-lewded game? Try again next time /buddy/.

THIRD OF ALL the people you play with is a guaranteed 50/50 as well.. You never know if you're gonna play with someone absolutely cracked. Like hasn't slept in 10 days trying to perfect this build kind of cracked. I respect it, honestly... The minmaxers on this game absolutely hurt my soul, because minmaxing on a game like this is, I can imagine, Painful, but someone has to do it. You guys are stronger than the US Marine Corps. The survivor mains are some of the nicest people I've ever met, as someone who plays both survivor and killer. Other than the aggressively sweaty people. I dont understand you, but you bought the game so do what u want ig? Playin' friendly killers is so rewarding because I get to see all the friendly faces <3

Lets not even talk about the amount of +rep's i have on my steam profile because of this godforsaken game. I don't even have 1000 hours in this game, and I can't imagine quitting yet. I've friended so many people on steam because of this fuCKiNG GAME- and I love every one platonically.

Horrible matchmaking and progression balance for new players, especially killers. For real, I need to grind for dozens and hundreds of hours first just to be able to actually play the game properly?
I can't even blame the players who "bully" the killers because after all they're just using the tools the devs give them, so this is all on the game itself. 
Also the controls, mechanics and animations feel very, very clumsy like from 2011.
All in all this game just doesn't seem worth the grind just to be rewarded with a boring whack-a-mole in the end at best, either on the winning or receiving side.

I have played a number of games in my lifetime, and I have never been hooked on a game as fast as I was on this one.  Both sides have challenges in their own right, and this game can be very fun.  As is with all games, there are undesirable people to play with/against, but I find the majority of the community is great to play with, and most content creators are very welcoming and enjoyable to watch.   I hope this game lasts a very long time!

Of course it has it's moments like any other game but I really do enjoy it!

Love this game! The horor aspects aren't too scary, but just enough to get your heart pumping. Definitely would recommend this game to 18+ and those who like horor elements. It's honestly so addicting.

The game is fun but the community is total trash. So many toxic players in this game being just absolute shit human beings. About half the matches end with insults being hurled at you for no reason at all. Play as killer and you'll be accused of camping, tunneling, slugging and a whole bunch of other shit. Play as survivor and you'll be accused of cheating in a variety of ways. It is worse to play as killer as the community is extremely survivor sided and this is where info cheating occurs a lot: swf's tend to use voice comms to relay information that they shouldn't be aware of. Don't get me wrong, I am guilty of this too but I do think it is a problem and one that needs to be addressed as this rends certain killer perks completely useless. I mean what is the point of survivors not being able to see the location of a downed survivor when they can just tell the other survivors where they are through discord. Just one example. An additional problem as killer is that you cannot opt out of facing swf groups.

TL;DR: Good game, shit community

Every hour I've spent equals how many neurons I've lost while playing this abhorrent and loathsome excuse for a game. Also if you come from a toxic community just like I do (Halo), you'll feel right at home.
ta lleno de bug pero ta piola

Not fun. You'll uninstall this game multiple times a week, and then reinstall it because something needs to fill the endless void that is your short attention span. I hate this game. It killed my entire family and is also very buggy and straight up doesn't let me take in-game screenshots. Get any game except for this game, because you're gonna hate hate HATE it. In the case that you DO install it,

 After you install this game, go outside. Go for a walk- a hike, even, and enjoy your last moments of intelligence. Now go to the nearest gas station and chug several gallons of gas. Now come back, open the game, and you should be on the same level of iq as your solo q teammates. Now you can play without worrying about your sanity decreasing because you're incapable of thinking now, like the majority of your teammates.
